title: Jim Liddle
text:
Jim Liddle (born 9 April 1958) is a retired Scottish professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="centre%20forward">centre forward</a> who played in the <a href="Scottish%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Cowdenbeath%20F.C.">Cowdenbeath</a>, <a href="Forfar%20Athletic%20F.C.">Forfar Athletic</a>, <a href="Meadowbank%20Thistle%20F.C.">Meadowbank Thistle</a> and <a href="Hamilton%20Academical%20F.C.">Hamilton Academical</a>.
Honours.
Forfar Athletic
Individual
